hero.title: Solar Fuel from Plastic Waste
hero.subtitle: Decentralized plastic reduction for coastal communities

problem.heading: The Problem
problem.text: Remote communities like Ladrilleros are drowning in plastic waste and diesel shortage.

stats.plastic: Plastic in the ocean per year

problem.more: Over 100kg of plastic is burned daily while fuel is scarce and expensive.

solution.heading: The Solution
solution.text: Solar-powered pyrolysis turns plastic into fuel.

business.heading: Business Model
business.text: Through fuel sales the system sustains itself.

impact.heading: Impact
impact.text: BASOLA creates environmental, social and climate impact.
